Action.author: jakeeyturner
Action.body: This API is needed in my use case to verify that the inputs of a transaction when hashed are equal to the hash of the value from a specified key and private data collection (which the transaction invoker is unauthorised to view).

Action.author: jtonline
Action.body: Doesn't look like this thing links to CRs automatically... https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/30403/
